news_title: Strategy Resumes Bitcoin Buying, Acquires 1,229 BTC for $109M
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Strategy purchased 1,229 Bitcoin for $108.8 million in the week ending Dec. 28, paying an average of $88,568 per coin. The company sold 663,450 shares of Class A common stock through its at-the-market program to fund the acquisition, generating $108.8 million in net ...

news_title: Bitcoin Whales Holding 1K-10K BTC Accumulating at $80K Price Level
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Wallets holding 1,000 to 10,000 Bitcoin have dominated buying since Bitcoin reached $80,000 in late November. Glassnode data shows this cohort maintains an Accumulation Trend Score near 1 as Bitcoin trades below $90,000. The metric tracks buying and selling across wa...

news_title: OCC Clarifies Banks' Role in Crypto Asset Transactions
news_subtitle: OCC allows banks to participate in risk-free crypto transactions, changing market dynamics. Read original article on coincu.com

news_title: Bitcoin Halving Cycle Dead as ETFs Change Game, Analysts Say

news_title: CARF tax rules go live on Jan. 1: What crypto users and exchanges need to know
news_subtitle: The OECD’s Crypto‑Asset Reporting Framework starts to bite in 2026 as UK and EU exchanges ramp up data collection.
